Notes: The agency collection was established during World War II and moved to Maxwell Air Force Base in 1949.  It serves as the repository of historical material for students, faculty, and visiting scholars at Maxwell's Air University.  Holdings total approximately 70,000,000 pages.  Unit histories provide narratives and supporting documents prepared by various military aviation units since 1942 and constitute a large portion of the collectioN  Other materials include monographs, oral histories, end-of-tour reports, personal papers, combined command documents, and USAF individual aircraft record cards. Holdings also include information on the early history of military aviation, USAF activities in the Southeast Asia and Persian Gulf wars, the British Air Ministry, the German Air Force, and US Army and Navy aviation.
Source of Repository Data: Alabama Department of Archives and History
